overview: Peter Miranda – Chief of Business Development Peter Miranda has been in the financial sector for over 15 years covering all different aspects, from navigating market conditions for his clients as a stockbroker, to raising funds to give them the best rate of return using his investment expertise. He started working with start-ups where he handled all aspects of investor relations for two separate start-ups, included raising 2 million dollars for 1st round funding (at the proof of concept stage) to raising 5 million for 2nd round funding (in the prototype stage). Part of his responsibilities included finding new investors as well as handling all current investors–from setting investor meetings to keeping correspondents updated of any changes to the direction of the companies.
